fields.name: signal_phase_id
fields.description: Required. Foreign key to signal_phase table.

fields.name: link_id
fields.description: Foreign key. The link covered by the detector.

fields.name: start_lane
fields.description: Left-most lane covered by the detector.

fields.name: end_lane
fields.description: Right-most lane covered by the detector (blank if only one lane).

fields.name: ref_node_id
fields.description: The detector is on the approach to this node.

fields.name: det_zone_lr
fields.description: Required. Distance from from reference node to detector.

fields.name: det_zone_front
fields.description: Optional. Linear reference of front of detection zone.

fields.name: det_zone_front
fields.description: Optional. Linear reference of front of detection zone.
